FuncDef: The reset radius-server accounting-stop-packet command clears statistics on the remaining buffer information of RADIUS accounting-stop packets. The reset radius-server accounting-stop-packet command clears statistics on the remaining buffer information of RADIUS accounting-stop packets.

ParaDef.Info:
Clears statistics on the remaining buffer information of RADIUS accounting-stop packets.
-

Clears statistics on the remaining buffer information of RADIUS accounting-stop packets with the specified IPv4 address.
The value of ipv4-address is in dotted decimal notation.
